    • Game

      public Game​(int score_t1, int score_t2, Map<Integer,​Integer> subs_t1, Map<Integer,​Integer> subs_t2, double time, Team t1, Team t2, boolean startTeam, boolean attackerTeam, boolean half, List<Integer> listPlayersT1, List<Integer> listPlayersT2)
      Parametrized constructor
      Parameters:
      score_t1 - Score of the first team
      score_t2 - Score of the second team
      subs_t1 - Map of substitutions of the first team
      subs_t2 - Map of substitutions of the seconds team
      time - Time passed
      t1 - Team 1
      t2 - Team 2
      startTeam - True if first team, false if second team
      attackerTeam - True if first team, false if second team
      half - True the first half has already passed, false if not
